snippet.title: HELLO KITTY’S DokokanaArcana Android iOS Gameplay (By SANRIOWAVE)
snippet.description:
HELLO KITTY’S DokokanaArcana By SANRIOWAVE CO., LTD. Gameplay First Look. (Android/iOS/iPhone/iPad) 

All your favorite adorable Sanrio characters are here in this search-and-find game! Hello Kitty and her friends accompany you as you search and tap different hidden characters and items! Find them quickly to achieve combos and get a high score!

You have just been appointed as Arcana Kingdom's new Minister of Finding. When you collect Ornaments, the Arcana Tree regains some of its power. Finding lots of Ornaments breathes new life into the Arcana Tree and saves the kingdom from disappearing!

Different Sanrio characters are your partners, helping you in your duties as Minister of Finding. Even more partner characters are planned to appear in the future, too!

Use the Gold you acquire in the finding games to spin the Gacha machines and collect Ornaments. The amount of Gold you get is related to how high your score is. The Ornaments you get from the Gacha machines can be used to decorate the tree.

There is also a story featuring cute and original characters exclusive to Hello Kitty's The Land of Hidden Objects ~DokokanaArcana~. We hope you'll come and meet them!

►SHARE, LIKE, SUBSCRIBE! http://bit.ly/oglgameplays ◄

Google Play  Download ►https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.sanriowave.edia.dokokanaarukana

iTunes Download ►
